ai_social_media: Create Powerful Content and Share It Everywhere with One Click
create_schedule_publish: AI-powered platform that takes you from idea to multi-platform publishing effortlessly.
suite_social_success: A Complete Platform for Social Success
omni_content_message: Craft content that resonates, drives interaction, and amplifies your online presence effortlessly—transforming your ideas into high-impact, platform-ready posts with advanced AI to connect with your audience and strengthen your brand across every social channel.
post_automation_message: Publish your content instantly with our lightning-fast, reliable system—offering single-click publishing across all platforms to reach your audience at the perfect moment for maximum engagement and impact.
media_optimization_message: Automatically resize posts for each platform and create striking video thumbnails for YouTube uploads. All this happens within an intuitive editing suite, allowing fast, seamless customization so your content looks perfect every time.
smart_insights_message: Get clear, actionable insights on your content performance across all platforms. Track engagement and reach to make smarter decisions and continuously improve your social media strategy.
instant_publishing_message: Publish your content instantly with our lightning-fast, reliable system. Reach your audience at the right moment, every time, ensuring maximum engagement and impact.
react_trends: React to the trends that matter
react_trends_message: Access the world’s largest archive of consumer opinion and leverage advanced proprietary and generative AI to discover new trends before anyone else and make smarter decisions.
manage_channels_message: Effortlessly oversee every platform from a single, unified dashboard—bringing clarity, control, and efficiency to your entire social ecosystem.
see_action_message: Experience the ease of creating and publishing content across every platform in moments.
loved_creators_message: See what our customers have to say about OmniShare
faq_message: Everything you need to know about OmniShare
testimonial_1: OmniShare has completely transformed how we manage our social media presence. The AI-powered content generation saves us hours every week.
testimonial_2: The analytics dashboard is simple and easy to use. While it offers basic insights, it helps us track key metrics efficiently. The platform is straightforward and reliable for our everyday needs.
testimonial_3: As a solo creator, OmniShare is a lifesaver. The AI instantly understands each platform’s style and delivers perfectly optimized content every time.
testimonial_4: Best investment we've made for our marketing stack. The time saved on content creation allows us to focus on strategy and growth. Highly recommend it for any specific workflow.
testimonial_5: The Social Media Post Design Tool makes it easy for us to create professional and creative content. It has proven to be extremely helpful for our entire team.
create_publish_message: OmniShare is an AI-powered content creation and social media management platform that lets you create, optimize, and publish posts across multiple platforms with a single click. From crafting engaging captions to scheduling platform-ready content, OmniShare streamlines your entire social workflow—helping you save time, boost engagement, and amplify your brand’s online presence effortlessly.
faq_how_is_my_data_protected: How is my data protected on OmniShare?
faq_how_is_my_data_protected_answer: All your data is encrypted both in transit (SSL/TLS) and at rest. We follow industry-standard security protocols to ensure your content, credentials, and account information remain safe.
faq_does_omnishare_store_credentials: Does OmniShare store my social media login credentials?
faq_does_omnishare_store_credentials_ans: No. OmniShare uses secure OAuth authentication wherever possible, meaning your login credentials are never stored on our servers. Access tokens are encrypted and securely managed.
faq_can_multiple_team_members_access: Can multiple team members access my account safely?
faq_can_multiple_team_members_access_ans: Yes. OmniShare supports role-based access controls, allowing you to assign permissions to team members while keeping sensitive information protected.
faq_prevent_unauthorized_access: How do you prevent unauthorized access?
faq_prevent_unauthorized_access_answer: We use multi-factor authentication (MFA), IP monitoring, and advanced anomaly detection to protect accounts from unauthorized access.
faq_security_audits: How often is OmniShare’s security audited?
faq_security_audits_answer: OmniShare undergoes regular internal and third-party security audits to ensure compliance with best practices and the latest standards.
faq_privacy_compliance: Is OmniShare compliant with privacy regulations?
faq_privacy_compliance_answer: Yes. OmniShare is designed to comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other global privacy regulations to protect your personal and organizational data.
faq_security_issue: What happens if a security issue arises?
faq_security_issue_answer: Our security team monitors the system 24/7. In case of an incident, we follow strict protocols to resolve it quickly and notify affected users as necessary.
ai_content_creation: How does OmniShare's AI-powered content creation work?
ai_content_creation_message: Our AI analyzes your brand voice, industry trends, and platform requirements to generate high-quality posts, captions, descriptions, and hashtags. You get ready-to-publish content tailored for each social platform.
platform_support: Which social media platforms does OmniShare support?
platform_support_message: You can manage Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and TikTok — all through one centralized system.
multi_publish: Can I publish on multiple platforms at once?
multi_publish_message: Yes. With one click, OmniShare lets you publish your content across all connected platforms. The system also auto-generates AI text and images when needed.
insights: What kind of insights does OmniShare provide?
insights_message: You get clear, actionable analytics on engagement, reach, performance trends, and audience behavior — helping you make smarter decisions to improve your social strategy.
publishing_speed: How fast is OmniShare's publishing system?
publishing_speed_message: Our instant publishing engine ensures your posts go live immediately and reliably — so you can reach your audience at the perfect moment.
trend_content: Can OmniShare help with trend-based content?
trend_content_message: Yes! OmniShare scans real-time trends and transforms them into powerful captions, descriptions, and viral hashtags tailored to each platform.
business_suitability: Is OmniShare suitable for businesses and teams?
business_suitability_message: Definitely. OmniShare is built for individuals, agencies, brands, and teams managing content across different platforms, regions, or client accounts.
demos: Do you offer demos or product walkthroughs?
demos_message: Yes! You can explore the full potential of OmniShare with a personalized product demo to see how it can elevate your social growth.
still_questions: Still have questions? Scroll up to contact us.
contact_us:

Contact us now.

support_welcome_intro: Welcome to OmniShare Support. We're here to help you get the most out of our platform. Whether you have questions, need technical assistance, or want to provide feedback, our support team is ready to assist you.
support_section_1_content: We offer support through email, live chat, and a comprehensive knowledge base to ensure you can reach us in the way that's most convenient for you.
support_response_time_content: Our support team aims to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. For urgent issues, please mark your request as 'Priority.'

terms_welcome_intro: Welcome to OmniShare. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website, mobile app, and services (collectively, the 'Service'). By accessing or using OmniShare, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our Service.
terms_section_1_item_1_desc: Includes OmniShare's website, mobile applications, APIs, and all related features.
terms_section_1_item_2_desc: Refers to any individual or organization accessing the Service.
terms_section_1_item_3_desc: Means any posts, images, videos, text, or data you create or upload to the Service.
terms_section_1_item_4_desc: Refers to the social media networks we integrate with (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn).
terms_section_2_intro: You must meet the following requirements to use OmniShare
terms_section_2_item_1_desc: You must be at least 18 years old.
terms_section_2_item_2_desc: You must have the legal authority to enter into binding agreements.
terms_section_2_item_3_desc: You agree not to use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms_section_3_item_1_desc: You must provide truthful and complete information during registration.
terms_section_3_item_2_desc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account.
terms_section_3_item_3_desc: You must notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized account access.
terms_section_3_item_4_desc: You are liable for all activities conducted through your account.
terms_section_4_item_1_desc: Use the Service in violation of any laws or regulations.
terms_section_4_item_2_desc: Upload content that is defamatory, obscene, or violates third-party rights.
terms_section_4_item_3_desc: Send unsolicited messages or engage in harassment.
terms_section_4_item_4_desc: Attempt to hack, bypass security measures, or unauthorized data access.
terms_section_4_item_5_desc: Use the Service to develop competing products or services.
terms_section_4_item_6_desc: Impersonate others or mislead about your identity.
terms_section_5_your_content_desc: You retain ownership of all content you create or upload. By uploading content, you grant OmniShare a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content for the purpose of providing the Service.
terms_section_5_our_content_desc: All intellectual property on OmniShare (including software, designs, text, logos) is owned by OmniShare. You may not reproduce, modify, or distribute our content without permission.
terms_section_6_intro: OmniShare integrates with third-party social media platforms. You agree to
terms_section_6_item_1_desc: Follow the terms and policies of each platform (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
terms_section_6_item_2_desc: Only authorize OmniShare to post content on your behalf.
terms_section_6_item_3_desc: OmniShare is not responsible for platform outages, policy changes, or data loss.
terms_section_7_billing_desc: Subscription fees are billed according to your chosen plan. All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes.
terms_section_7_renewal_desc: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled before the renewal date.
terms_section_7_cancel_desc: You may cancel your subscription anytime through your account settings. Refunds will not be issued for partial months.
terms_section_7_security_desc: We process payments through secure third-party providers and do not store full credit card information.
terms_section_8_intro: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, OMNISHARE IS PROVIDED 'AS-IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
terms_section_8_not_liable: OmniShare shall NOT be liable for
terms_section_8_item_1: Indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages.
terms_section_8_item_2: Loss of data, revenue, or business opportunities.
terms_section_8_item_3: Third-party platform actions or policy changes.
terms_section_8_total_liability: Our total liability is limited to the fees paid by you in the last 12 months.
terms_section_9_intro: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless OmniShare from any claims, damages, or costs arising from
terms_section_9_item_1: Your use of the Service in violation of these Terms.
terms_section_9_item_2: Your Content or data infringement claims.
terms_section_9_item_3: Your violation of applicable laws or third-party rights.
terms_section_10_intro: OmniShare may suspend or terminate your account if
terms_section_10_item_1_desc: You violate these Terms of Service.
terms_section_10_item_2_desc: We suspect illegal activity or fraud.
terms_section_10_item_3_desc: Payment is not received or declined.
terms_section_10_item_4_desc: Your content violates OmniShare's policies or platform policies.
terms_section_10_upon_termination: Upon termination, your account and all associated data will be deleted within 30 days, unless required to retain by law.
terms_section_11_content: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of OmniShare after changes means you accept the updated Terms. We will notify you of major changes via email.
terms_section_12_content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of the UAE.
terms_section_13_intro: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us
terms_section_14_content: These Terms of Service, along with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and OmniShare. Any other agreements or representations are void.
terms_footer_text: This Terms of Service is effective as of
terms_footer_suffix: and applies to all users of OmniShare
privacy_intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how OmniShare collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information. Our commitment to transparency helps you understand your rights and how we handle your data.
privacy_agreement: By accessing or using OmniShare, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our practices, please discontinue using the platform.
privacy_section_1_1_content: When you create an account or use OmniShare, you provide us with information such as name, email address, password, business details, payment information, and social media account credentials.
privacy_section_1_2_content: We automatically collect technical data including IP address, browser type, device information, access times, pages visited, and interaction data on our platform.
privacy_section_1_3_content: We receive information from your connected social media accounts, payment processors, and analytics providers to improve our service and ensure compliance.
privacy_section_2_item_1: Providing platform services, account management, and customer support
privacy_section_2_item_2: Processing payments, managing subscriptions, and preventing fraud
privacy_section_2_item_3: Improving our platform, personalizing your experience, and conducting analytics
privacy_section_2_item_4: Sending marketing communications, updates, and promotional materials (with your consent)
privacy_section_2_item_5: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our legal rights
privacy_section_2_item_6: Detecting and preventing abuse, security threats, and unauthorized access
privacy_section_2_item_7: Conducting research and developing new features
privacy_section_2_item_8: Personalizing content recommendations and optimizing your experience
privacy_section_2_item_9: Creating anonymous, aggregated data for analytical purposes
privacy_section_3_1_item_1: Payment processors: We share payment information with secure payment processors
privacy_section_3_1_item_2: Cloud hosting providers: Our data is stored on secure cloud infrastructure
privacy_section_3_1_item_3: Analytics services: We use analytics tools to understand user behavior
privacy_section_3_1_item_4: Email service providers: For transactional and marketing communications
privacy_section_3_2_content: To provide our services, you authorize us to access and interact with your social media accounts. We only access data necessary to perform posting, scheduling, and analytics functions.
privacy_section_3_3_item_1: We may disclose information if required by law, court order, or government request
privacy_section_3_3_item_2: We protect your privacy to the extent permitted by law
privacy_section_3_3_item_3: We will notify you of legal requests unless prohibited by law
privacy_section_3_3_disclaimer: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes.
privacy_section_4_item_1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols
privacy_section_4_item_2: Secure authentication, access controls, and regular security audits
privacy_section_4_item_3: Compliance with international data protection standards
privacy_section_4_disclaimer: While we strive to protect your data, no system is 100% secure. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
privacy_section_5_intro: Depending on your location, you have the following rights
privacy_section_5_item_1_desc: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
privacy_section_5_item_2_desc: You can update or correct inaccurate information in your account
privacy_section_5_item_3_desc: You can request deletion of your account and associated data
privacy_section_5_item_4_desc: You can opt out of marketing communications at any time
privacy_section_5_item_5_desc: You can request your data in a portable, machine-readable format
privacy_section_5_contact_intro: To exercise these rights, please contact
privacy_section_6_intro: We use cookies and similar technologies for
privacy_section_6_item_4: Personalizing your experience and targeted advertising
privacy_section_6_disclaimer: You can control cookie settings through your browser. Disabling cookies may affect platform functionality.
privacy_section_7_item_1: Account active period plus 12 months after deletion for compliance
privacy_section_7_item_2: Transactional data for 7 years for accounting and tax purposes
privacy_section_7_item_3: Cookies until expiration or until you clear them
privacy_section_7_disclaimer: We may retain anonymized data indefinitely for analytical purposes.
privacy_section_8_intro: OmniShare is not directed to users under 13 years of age.
privacy_section_8_content: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete such information and terminate the child's account immediately. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided information to OmniShare should contact us immediately.
privacy_section_9_content_1: Your information may be transferred to, stored in, and processed in countries other than your country of residence, which may have different data protection laws.
privacy_section_9_content_2: By using OmniShare, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries outside your country of residence for processing as described in this policy.
privacy_section_10_content_1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable law.
privacy_section_10_content_2: We will notify you of material changes by email or through a prominent notice on our platform.
privacy_section_10_content_3: Your continued use of OmniShare after changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
privacy_section_11_intro: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us
privacy_policy_footer_text: This privacy policy is effective as of
privacy_policy_footer_suffix: and applies to all users of OmniShare
